See also: foto, fotó, and foto-

German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /foːto/
  • audio
    		(file)

Etymology 1[edit]

Clipping of Fotografie.

Noun[edit]

Foto n (genitive Fotos, plural Fotos)

  1. photograph (picture created by projecting an image onto a photosensitive surface)
Declension[edit]
Declension of Foto
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeindasFotodieFotos
genitiveeinesdesFotosderFotos
dativeeinemdemFotodenFotos
accusativeeindasFotodieFotos

Further reading[edit]

  • Foto in Duden online
  • “das Foto” in Digitales Wörterbuch der deutschen Sprache

Etymology 2[edit]

Clipping of Fotoapparat.

Noun[edit]

Foto m (genitive Fotos, plural Fotos)

  1. (colloquial) camera (device for making still pictures)
Declension[edit]
Declension of Foto
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinderFotodieFotos
genitiveeinesdesFotosderFotos
dativeeinemdemFotodenFotos
accusativeeinendenFotodieFotos
